committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution commending Dr. M. Stanley Livingston upon the fiftieth anniversary of his original work in the field of cyclic acceleration.

summary.text: Commends Doctor M. Stanley Livingston upon the 50th anniversary of his original developments in cyclic acceleration, and upon his further leadership in the field of accelerators.

titles.title: A resolution commending Dr. M. Stanley Livingston upon the fiftieth anniversary of his original work in the field of cyclic acceleration.
